FLAVOUR_0_DESC.message: Contact the local Interstellar Pilots' Fuel Co-operative representative.

FLAVOUR_0_MEMBER_INTRO.message: You may purchase fuel and dispose of {radioactives} here.

FLAVOUR_0_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: {clubname} je nezávislá organizace určená k poskytování slevněného paliva jejím členům. Pobočky lze najít po celé galaxii. Výhody pro členy zahrnují:

FLAVOUR_1_CLUBNAME.description: Fuel club for the Federation faction

FLAVOUR_1_DESC.description: Fuel club for the Federation faction
FLAVOUR_1_DESC.message: Authorized contact for The Federal Fuel Foundation.

FLAVOUR_1_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: {clubname} is the leading provider of discounted fuel to its members' starships in the Solar Federation. A membership will entitle you for the following:

FLAVOUR_2_CLUBNAME.description: Fuel club for the CIW (Commonwealth of Independent Worlds) faction

FLAVOUR_2_DESC.description: Fuel club for the CIW (Commonwealth of Independent Worlds) faction
FLAVOUR_2_DESC.message: Make an appointment to speak with the Commonwealth Fuel Union.

FLAVOUR_2_NONMEMBER_INTRO.description: Commonwealth of Independent Worlds is the name of the CIW faction
FLAVOUR_2_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: Throughout the vast reach of the free Commonwealth of Independent Worlds you will find {clubname} as the best provider of discounted fuel and waste management services. For our members, we do:

FLAVOUR_2_WELCOME.message: Greetings and salutations! We hope you enjoy our services.

FLAVOUR_3_CLUBNAME.description: Fuel club for the Haber faction

FLAVOUR_3_DESC.description: Fuel club for the Haber faction
FLAVOUR_3_DESC.message: Branch office of the Haber Propellant and Perishables Division.

FLAVOUR_3_MEMBER_INTRO.description: For the greedy Haber faction, very corporate formulated
FLAVOUR_3_MEMBER_INTRO.message: Greetings pilot. Your refueling and conditional side-product disposal privileges are granted.

FLAVOUR_3_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: Greetings pilot. This is the Haber Propellant and Perishables Division, entrusted with managing the fuel distribution throughout Haber owned space.

LIST_BENEFITS_FUEL_INTRO.message: Naše vlastní zásoby paliva, nezávislé na obecném trhu

LIST_BENEFITS_FUEL_TANK.message: Fuel tank refilling, once per day

LIST_BENEFITS_JOIN.message: Vstupte ihned! Roční náklady na členství pouze {membership_fee}

REFUEL_FREE.message: Refuel internal fuel tank for free.

WE_WILL_ONLY_DISPOSE_OF.message: Pro {radioactives} platí následující pravidlo: zlikvidujeme ho tolik tun, kolik {military_fuel} jsi u nás koupil.

YOUR_MEMBERSHIP_APPLICATION_HAS_BEEN_DEC.message: Vaše žádost o členství byla zamítnuta.

YOU_ARE_NOW_A_MEMBER.message: Nyní jste členem. Vaše členství vyprší {expiry_date}.

YOU_MUST_BUY.message: Nejdřív musíš koupit naše {military_fuel} než převezmeme tvůj {radioactives}
